card_text: At the start of your Battle Phase: You can place 1 counter on this card (max. 2). This card gains the following effect, based on the number of counters on it.$N●1: Once per turn, when an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can negate that attack.$N●2: You can Tribute this card; banish all monsters on the field, until your opponent's 2nd End Phase.
